about_the_game:
The Capsa - Vehicle Essentials Pack includes a selection of items to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.

This pack of cosmetic items contains 8 tires, 8 rims, 8 steering wheels, 10 horns, 2 hood ornaments and Neons. A glow kit is also included for horse mounts.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Vehicle Neon Underglow
  • Road Neon Tire Bundle
  • Offroad Tire Bundle 1
  • Vehicle Steering Wheel Pack 1
  • Vehicle Steering Wheel Pack 2
  • Vehicle Novelty Horn Bundle
  • Vehicle Bugle Horn Bundle
  • Vehicle Classic Rim Bundle 1
  • Vehicle Military Rim Bundle 1
  • Smiley Face Silver Hood Ornament
  • Smiley Face Gold Hood Ornament
  • Horse Glow Kit
